package.name: starling.animation
package.shortDescription: The components of Starlings animation system.

package.name: starling.core
package.shortDescription: Contains the core component of the framework.

package.name: starling.display
package.shortDescription: The main classes from which to build anything that is displayed on the screen.

package.name: starling.errors
package.shortDescription: A set of commonly used error classes.

package.name: starling.events
package.shortDescription: A simplified version of Flash's DOM event model, including an alternative EventDispatcher base class.

package.name: starling.geom
package.shortDescription: Geometry classes that expand on what the corresponding Flash package has to offer.

package.name: starling.text
package.shortDescription: Classes for working with text fields and bitmap fonts.

package.name: starling.textures
package.shortDescription: Classes to create and work with GPU texture data.

package.name: starling.filters
package.shortDescription: Post processing filters for special effects.

package.name: starling.styles
package.shortDescription: Styles completely modify the way a mesh is rendered and batched.

package.name: starling.rendering
package.shortDescription: All things related to Stage3D rendering.
